attributes.action: Bring Tony Blair to Justice for War Crimes and the deaths of hundreds of British Troops
attributes.additional_details:
In August 2011 the former Director-General of the British Intelligence Agency MI5 (Dame Eliza Manningham-Buller) went on record stating that "Iraq did not present a threat to the UK" when Tony Blair took the country to war.

This petition is being lodged in order to ask that the current UK Government debates & scrutinizes in OPEN DISCUSSION WITHIN PARLIAMENT, the former PM [Tony Blair's] "personal culpability" for the loss of so many brave British Soldiers' lives and bring Tony Blair before the Criminal (or Civil) Courts, if the recent statement made by the ex-MI5 Boss is deemed to be true and accurate
